title: RTIC Shift Scheduler
shortDescription: A comprehensive shift scheduling and management system for Real-Time Intelligence Center (RTIC) operations. Features role-based access control, real-time updates, automated email notifications, shift signup workflows, and detailed analytics dashboard.
longDescription:
# RTIC Shift Scheduler

A production-grade web application designed for Real-Time Intelligence Center (RTIC) departments to manage shift scheduling, user assignments, and operational coordination.

## The Challenge

RTIC departments operate on complex shift schedules with specific staffing requirements:
- **Standard Schedule**: Tuesday-Friday, 11:00-23:00 (12-hour shifts)
- **Minimum Staffing**: 2 RTIC members per shift
- **Maximum Staffing**: 3 RTIC members + 1 LEO (Law Enforcement Officer) per shift
- **Multiple Roles**: Dispatchers, Officers, Supervisors, Analysts, Fire liaisons
- **Flexible Signups**: Full shift, first half, second half, or custom hours

Manual scheduling creates challenges:
- No centralized view of shift availability
- Difficult to track signup requests and approvals
- Hard to ensure proper staffing levels
- No automated notifications for assignments
- Limited reporting and analytics
- Poor mobile accessibility

## The Solution

The RTIC Scheduler provides a complete shift management platform with real-time coordination, automated workflows, and comprehensive administrative controls.

## Core Features

### Shift Management System

#### Shift Creation & Configuration
- **Flexible Scheduling**: Define shifts with custom date, time, and duration
- **Staffing Rules**: Set minimum/maximum RTIC members and LEO limits
- **Signup Control**: Toggle shifts open/closed for user signups
- **Shift Notes**: Add context and special instructions
- **Bulk Operations**: Create multiple shifts at once
- **Visual Indicators**: Color-coded status (open, pending, assigned, understaffed)

#### Color-Coded Shift Status
- **Light Blue**: Open for signup
- **Yellow**: Pending approvals needed
- **Green**: Fully assigned (2-3 people)
- **Dark Green**: Maximum staffed (3 RTIC + 1 LEO)
- **Orange**: Understaffed (< 2 people)
- **Red Striped**: Vacated shift requiring reassignment
- **Gray**: Past dates (read-only)

#### Shift Signup Types
- **Full Shift**: Complete 12-hour shift (11:00-23:00)
- **First Half**: Morning portion (11:00-17:00, 6 hours)
- **Second Half**: Evening portion (17:00-23:00, 6 hours)
- **Custom Hours**: User-defined start and end times
- **Notes Field**: Add availability comments or requests

### User Management & Roles

#### Role-Based Access Control
- **Admin**: Full system access, user management, settings configuration
- **RTIC Manager**: Shift approval, assignment, reporting access
- **RTIC Supervisor**: Shift approval and assignment capabilities
- **RTIC Officer**: Law Enforcement Officer (subject to LEO limits)
- **RTIC Dispatcher**: Standard user with signup privileges
- **RTIC Fire**: Fire department liaison role
- **RTIC Analyst**: Data analyst with reporting access

#### User Administration (Admin Only)
- **User Directory**: Searchable table of all system users
- **Role Assignment**: Modify user roles and permissions
- **Activity Tracking**: Last active timestamps and login history
- **Hours Worked**: Cumulative hours per user
- **Status Management**: Active/inactive user status
- **Admin Badges**: Visual indicators for administrative users
- **Profile Management**: Edit user details and preferences

### My Schedule - Floating Action Button (FAB) ⭐

#### Quick Access Feature
- **Persistent FAB**: Blue floating button (bottom-right of screen)
- **Slide-in Modal**: Smooth animation from right side
- **Always Available**: Accessible from any page in the application
- **Mobile Optimized**: Touch-friendly interaction

#### Three-Tab Interface

**1. Upcoming Shifts Tab**
- Real-time countdown timers to next shift
- Shift date, time, and duration display
- Quick stats: Total upcoming shifts, hours this week
- Expandable cards with full shift details
- "Vacate Shift" button for cancellations
- Color-coded shift types

**2. Pending Requests Tab**
- All signup requests awaiting approval
- Requested shift type (full/half/custom)
- Submission timestamp
- "Cancel Signup" functionality
- Status badges (pending, approved, declined)
- Notes field showing user comments

**3. History Tab**
- Completed shifts archive
- Hours worked tracking
- Shift performance history
- Date range filtering
- Export capability

### Admin Dashboard

#### System Overview
- **Quick Stats**: Total users, shifts, assignments this month
- **Shift Coverage**: Percentage of shifts fully staffed
- **Pending Actions**: Awaiting approvals count
- **System Health**: Understaffed shifts alert
- **Quick Links**: Navigate to all admin functions

#### Shift Management Interface
- **All Shifts Table**: View every shift in system
- **Create New Shifts**: Modal form with validation
- **Edit Shifts**: Modify date, time, staffing requirements
- **Delete Shifts**: Remove unused or cancelled shifts
- **Bulk Actions**: Process multiple shifts at once
- **Real-time Stats**: See staffing status instantly
- **Filter Options**: By date range, status, user

### Calendar Views

#### Interactive Calendar
- **Month View**: Traditional calendar layout with shift previews
- **Week View**: Detailed week-by-week breakdown
- **Day View**: Hour-by-hour schedule for a single day
- **Color-Coded Events**: Visual shift status at a glance
- **Click to Details**: Expand shift information inline
- **Legend**: Explanation of all color codes
- **Navigation**: Easy month/week/day switching

#### Calendar Features
- **Real-time Updates**: Live shift changes via Supabase subscriptions
- **Staffing Indicators**: See assigned count on each shift
- **Filter by User**: View specific user's schedule
- **Export Options**: Print or PDF calendar
- **Responsive Design**: Works on mobile and desktop

### Approval Workflow

#### For Admins/Supervisors
- **Pending Signups Page**: Central approval queue
- **User Details**: See who requested each shift
- **Shift Conflicts**: Automatic detection of overlapping requests
- **Approve/Decline**: One-click actions with notes
- **Bulk Approve**: Process multiple signups at once
- **Email Notifications**: Automatic user notification on decision
- **Audit Trail**: Log all approval decisions

#### For Users
- **Real-time Status**: See approval status immediately
- **Email Notifications**: Receive confirmation emails
- **In-app Alerts**: Toast notifications for status changes
- **Pending Count**: Badge showing awaiting approvals

### Email Notification System

#### Automated Emails
- **Shift Assignment**: Confirmation when assigned to shift
- **Shift Removal**: Notification when removed from shift
- **Signup Approval**: Confirmation of approved signup
- **Signup Decline**: Notice with reason (if provided)
- **Shift Vacation**: Alert supervisors when shift vacated
- **Monthly Reminders**: Upcoming schedule summary
- **Schedule Changes**: Notification of shift modifications

#### Email Templates
- **Professional Design**: Branded HTML email templates
- **Mobile Responsive**: Optimized for all devices
- **Action Links**: Direct links to relevant pages
- **Calendar Attachments**: ICS files for calendar import

### Reports & Analytics

#### User Reports
- **Hours Worked**: Total hours by user and date range
- **Shift Attendance**: Completion rate per user
- **Signup Patterns**: Most/least requested shifts
- **Role Distribution**: Staffing breakdown by role

#### System Reports
- **Shift Coverage**: Percentage of fully staffed shifts
- **Understaffing Alerts**: Shifts below minimum
- **Overstaffing Analysis**: Shifts at maximum capacity
- **Historical Trends**: Staffing patterns over time
- **LEO Utilization**: Law Enforcement Officer shift distribution

#### Export Capabilities
- **PDF Reports**: Professional formatted documents
- **Excel Export**: Full data with formulas
- **CSV Download**: Raw data for external analysis
- **Date Range Selection**: Custom reporting periods

### Security & Audit

#### Authentication
- **Supabase Auth**: Secure authentication service
- **Session Management**: 60-minute timeout for security
- **Password Reset**: Self-service password recovery
- **Email Verification**: Confirmed email addresses
- **Role Verification**: Server-side permission checks

#### Row Level Security (RLS)
- **Database Policies**: PostgreSQL RLS on all tables
- **User Isolation**: Users see only relevant data
- **Admin Overrides**: Full visibility for administrators
- **Audit Logging**: Track all data access

#### Audit Trail
- **Complete Logging**: All schedule changes tracked
- **User Actions**: Who made what changes and when
- **IP Address Tracking**: Security event monitoring
- **Change History**: Before/after values for modifications
- **Indefinite Retention**: Audit logs never deleted
- **Search & Filter**: Find specific events

### Data Management

#### Data Retention
- **3-Year Policy**: Shift data retained for 3 years
- **Audit Logs**: Retained indefinitely
- **User Profiles**: Active until account deleted
- **Archive Function**: Manual archive of old shifts
- **Data Export**: Download before deletion

## Technical Architecture

### Frontend Stack
- **Next.js 16**: React framework with App Router and Turbopack
- **React 18**: Latest React with concurrent features
- **TypeScript 5**: Full type safety throughout application
- **Tailwind CSS 3**: Utility-first styling framework
- **React Big Calendar**: Interactive calendar component
- **date-fns 4**: Modern date manipulation library
- **Lucide React**: Comprehensive icon system
- **react-hot-toast**: Toast notification library
- **next-themes**: Dark mode support
- **clsx**: Dynamic className utility

### Backend Stack
- **Supabase**: Backend-as-a-Service platform
- **PostgreSQL**: Relational database with full SQL support
- **Supabase Auth**: Authentication and user management
- **Supabase Real-time**: WebSocket subscriptions for live updates
- **Row Level Security**: Database-level access control
- **Server Actions**: Next.js server-side mutations
- **Edge Functions**: Serverless function support

### Database Schema

#### Core Tables

**profiles**
- User profile information
- Role assignment (admin, supervisor, dispatcher, etc.)
- Hours worked tracking
- Last active timestamps
- User preferences and settings

**shifts**
- Shift date, start time, end time
- Staffing requirements (min/max/LEO)
- Signup availability toggle
- Shift notes and special instructions
- Created by and modified tracking

**shift_signups**
- User signup requests
- Requested shift type (full/half/custom)
- Approval status (pending/approved/declined)
- Custom start/end times if applicable
- User notes and comments
- Submission timestamp

**shift_assignments**
- Final approved assignments
- Assigned user and shift relationship
- Assignment type (full/half/custom)
- Actual hours worked
- Marked as worked status
- Vacation/cancellation tracking

**skills**
- Available skill types (e.g., "DFR Pilot")
- Skill descriptions
- Active/inactive status

**user_skills**
- User-to-skill mapping
- Skill level or certification
- Expiration dates

**news_updates**
- Dashboard announcements
- Expiration dates for time-sensitive news
- Author and publish date

**dashboard_widgets**
- Customizable dashboard components
- Widget type and configuration
- User-specific widget settings

**audit_log**
- Complete change tracking
- Action type (create/update/delete)
- Before/after values
- User and timestamp
- IP address

**email_queue**
- Outgoing email queue
- Email template and recipient
- Send status tracking
- Retry logic for failures

### Data Flow

1. **User Action**: User initiates action (signup, approve, etc.)
2. **Client Validation**: React form validation and UI feedback
3. **Server Action**: Next.js server action processes request
4. **Permission Check**: Verify user role and permissions
5. **Database Update**: Supabase updates via RLS policies
6. **Email Queue**: Add notification to email queue if needed
7. **Real-time Broadcast**: Supabase broadcasts change to subscribed clients
8. **UI Update**: React components re-render with new data
9. **Audit Log**: Record action in audit trail

## Deployment Architecture

### Production Environment
- **Frontend**: Vercel (Next.js optimized hosting)
- **Backend**: Supabase (managed PostgreSQL + services)
- **SSL/TLS**: Automatic HTTPS on both platforms
- **CDN**: Vercel Edge Network for fast global delivery
- **Database**: Supabase managed PostgreSQL with backups
- **Uptime**: 99.9% SLA on both platforms

### CI/CD Workflow
- **Git Repository**: GitHub for version control
- **Auto-Deploy**: Vercel deploys on push to main branch
- **Preview Deploys**: Automatic preview for PRs
- **Environment Variables**: Managed in Vercel dashboard
- **Database Migrations**: Supabase migration system
- **Zero Downtime**: Rolling updates for deployments

### Performance Optimizations
- **Turbopack**: 700x faster than Webpack for dev builds
- **Server Components**: Reduced client-side JavaScript
- **Edge Functions**: Low-latency API responses
- **Image Optimization**: Next.js automatic image optimization
- **Code Splitting**: Automatic route-based splitting
- **Caching**: Aggressive caching strategies

## Key Innovations

### Floating Action Button (FAB)
- First scheduling app to implement persistent FAB for personal schedule
- Always accessible without navigation
- Three-tab interface consolidates all user actions
- Real-time countdown timers to next shift
- Mobile-first design pattern

### Real-time Collaboration
- Multiple admins can approve signups simultaneously
- Live updates when shifts are modified
- Instant notification when assigned to shift
- No page refresh needed
- WebSocket-based subscriptions

### Intelligent Staffing Rules
- Automatic enforcement of min/max staffing
- LEO (Law Enforcement Officer) limit tracking
- Visual indicators for understaffed shifts
- Conflict detection for overlapping signups
- Predictive staffing analytics

### Comprehensive Audit Trail
- Every action logged with full context
- Track who approved/declined signups
- See complete history of shift changes
- IP address tracking for security
- Indefinite retention for compliance

## User Experience

### Dashboard Interface
- **Clean Design**: Focus on actionable information
- **Quick Stats**: Key metrics at a glance
- **Visual Calendar**: Color-coded month view
- **Fast Navigation**: Sidebar and top navigation
- **Role-Appropriate**: Show only relevant features

### Mobile Experience
- **Responsive Layout**: Works on all screen sizes
- **Touch-Friendly**: Large tap targets
- **FAB Accessibility**: Easy thumb reach on mobile
- **Swipe Gestures**: Navigate calendar views
- **Optimized Forms**: Mobile keyboard optimization

### Admin Experience
- **Centralized Control**: All admin functions in one place
- **Bulk Operations**: Process multiple items efficiently
- **Search & Filter**: Find users and shifts quickly
- **Visual Indicators**: Understand system state at a glance
- **Quick Actions**: One-click common operations
